title: Yumedamaya Kidan
synopsis: Naho, an eleven-year-old girl, lives with her father and her two-year-old brother Jun. Her mother died after giving birth to Jun, so Naho has to take care of young Jun at home. Understandingly, this situation is frustrating to little Naho. A girl of her age would be dying to go out and play with friends, but because of Jun, she has to give priority to her duties.
staff: [['Nakatake, Tetsuya', ['Producer']], ['Kawasaki, Itsurou', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['REMI', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nakamura, Shouko', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']]]
